__e: I know I have no right to ask, but I have one more mission for you.
I missed you, too. Uh, maybe this is the wrong time to ask this, but don't you have a boyfriend?
Listen, i know I'm being overly sensitive, and i probably shouldn't even ask, but...
Yeah, Caroline said you were, but I just wanted to talk to you myself, that's all.
She made me come down and ask you in person.
I'm sorry to do this again, but could you look after Ben for a bit?
I meant to ask you in there, do you recognize this girl?
Okay, I shouldn't have shown it to Jack without asking you first.
And I was wrong that I didn't ask you before, but I'm asking you now.
Wait, are you asking me that question, or should I be asking you?
I been waiting for you to tell me who this chick is, but it looks like I'm just gonna have to ask.
Since you're here, I want something from you
Might, may I ask, and I apologize if this is too personal, but you have chosen such a difficult life.
[smooches] Look, I've been thinking about it all week while you've been here, and I know I'm not supposed to ask and put weird pressure on things, but... move in with me.
I... I wanted to go out with you but...but I was too scared to ask and that...that's the truth, OK?

"Bring your dad to school day"-- he didn't even bother asking you 'cause he knew you wouldn't show.
